scripts.dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --force-recreate -d && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs --tail 20 -f api web
scripts.dev:vpn: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.vpn.yml up --force-recreate -d && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs --tail 20 -f api web
scripts.build-and-push: (cd packages/api && docker build . -t iam4x/bobarr-api:latest) && (cd packages/web && docker build . -t iam4x/bobarr-web:latest) && docker image push iam4x/bobarr-api:latest && docker image push iam4x/bobarr-web:latest
